I'm excited to connect with like-minded professionals and explore new, innovative collaborations to push creative boundaries. Let’s connect and make bold ideas a reality!🤝

detailed_profile.name: Kshitij Chandra Prasad
detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

current_company.name: GoTo Group
current_company.title: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth

experience.title: Lead - Product Business Strategy & Operations (Ads)
experience.description: Gojek’s Ads monetization team was a start-up within a unicorn when I joined; over four years, I helped scale it into a multi-million-dollar business.Scaled revenue 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and GTM execution across sales, product, and marketing.Built and led teams of 8–20 across campaign ops, strategy, and design.Created product roadmap and launched 5+ ad products, adding $XM+ monthly revenue.Implemented Tableau reporting for centralized campaign tracking and performance visibility.Launched DSP platform to automate advertiser onboarding and boost self-serve capabilities
experience.description_html:
Gojek’s Ads monetization team was a start-up within a unicorn when I joined; over four years, I helped scale it into a multi-million-dollar business.

Scaled revenue 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and GTM execution across sales, product, and marketing.

Built and led teams of 8–20 across campaign ops, strategy, and design.

Created product roadmap and launched 5+ ad products, adding $XM+ monthly revenue.

Implemented Tableau reporting for centralized campaign tracking and performance visibility.

Launched DSP platform to automate advertiser onboarding and boost self-serve capabilities

experience.title: Manager Sales Operations
experience.description: Fintech SME lender; first start-up role.Reduced loan disbursal time by 50% by co-developing a sales app to streamline document uploads.Improved disbursals by 20% by identifying and fixing revenue leakage in the loan funnel.Led revenue forecasting & territory planning for 100+ field sales reps.Designed and rolled out process improvements in collaboration with product & ops teams.Created dashboards and performance reports for leadership to track sales productivity.
experience.description_html:
Fintech SME lender; first start-up role.

Reduced loan disbursal time by 50% by co-developing a sales app to streamline document uploads.

Improved disbursals by 20% by identifying and fixing revenue leakage in the loan funnel.

Led revenue forecasting & territory planning for 100+ field sales reps.

Designed and rolled out process improvements in collaboration with product & ops teams.

Created dashboards and performance reports for leadership to track sales productivity.

recommendations: Yong Hao Phoy “During my time as Regional Head of Commercial for C2B and B2C businesses at Carsome, I worked closely with Piyush Palkar. His expertise in analytics, AI/ML-driven innovations, and leadership as Chief Data Officer played a key role in driving important initiatives for the company. We worked together to establish a uniform pricing strategy, including the Buyer Calculator for purchase and an Automated Retail Pricing Strategy, ensuring consistency and scalability for both C2B and B2C businesses. Piyush also led the design and implementation of an automated data monitoring process, which improved efficiency and provided valuable insights for decision-making. Working with Piyush was a great experience, and I truly value his expertise, leadership, and teamwork.”

Priyanka Harlalka “Piyush was a wonderful manager to work with, and has great expertise in leadership, mentoring, motivation. He was very supportive and always encouraged to learn new tools and technology. He's very much a hands-on manager and always had a clear understanding of business requirements. Even in tight deadlines and in a situation of crisis, he was always there guiding us, and not losing his cool. Very focused, dedicated and always carried a positive attitude towards work and his subordinates. Keep up the good work! Hope to work together in the future.”

volunteer_experience.info: The Global CDO Ambassador Program provides a partnership between the CDO Ambassador, MIT CDOIQ Symposium, International Society of Chief Data Officers, Institute for Chief Data Officers, and CDO Magazine. https://cdoiq.mit.edu/https://iscdo.org/https://www.cdomagazine.tech/The vision of the program is to create and grow a global CDO community of data champions with the following primary objectives:> Empower Global CDO Ambassadors to build, champion, and… Show more The Global CDO Ambassador Program provides a partnership between the CDO Ambassador, MIT CDOIQ Symposium, International Society of Chief Data Officers, Institute for Chief Data Officers, and CDO Magazine. https://cdoiq.mit.edu/https://iscdo.org/https://www.cdomagazine.tech/The vision of the program is to create and grow a global CDO community of data champions with the following primary objectives:> Empower Global CDO Ambassadors to build, champion, and deliver data value to their constituents> Exchange ideas, success stories, and lessons learned> Develop and authentic, informal, and informative community of CDOs, by CDOs, and for CDOs> Serve as a platform for CDOs to elevate the value of data assets for their organizations > Disseminate knowledge to the data management community through the four founding organizations listed above> Recognize outstanding commitment of community members with Country CDO Ambassador awards Show less

detailed_profile.name: Miguel Andre Cornejo Guanilo
detailed_profile.position: Data Engineer Cloud
detailed_profile.about: Ingeniero de Sistemas Computacionales de la universidad privada del norte, cuento con experiencia en base de datos, análisis de datos, soluciones cloud. Me considero una persona seria, responsable, con muchas ganas de trabajar y aprender, con facilidad de adaptación y capacidad de trabajar en equipo, en condiciones de alta presión. Tengo la iniciativa de resolver problemas eficientemente y lograr las metas y objetivos trazados por la empresa. Mi objetivo profesional es poder Desempeñarme, ofrecer y desarrollar todas mis capacidades innatas, consiguiendo un excelente resultado en la labor y el área asignada; además, adquirir a través de la responsabilidad y confianza en mí depositada, una experiencia inigualable, con la cual conseguiré un paso importante en mi superación personal, junto con el orgullo de hacer parte de su equipo de trabajo.

experience.title: Data Engineer
experience.description: - Participación en el proyecto fénix con la migración de data del BCP de los servidores on premise hacia cloud con ADF.-Creación de scripts en DwH para poder almacenar datos en un servidor del bcp y poder llevalos hacia la nube utilizando Azure data Factory y databrick.- Creación de pipelines con ADF para los procesos transitorios del banco.- Uso de databricks para la transformación de los archivos migrados a la capa DDV.- Uso de jira y bitbucket para la documentación de la iniciativa y poder realizar los pases a producción
experience.description_html:
- Participación en el proyecto fénix con la migración de data del BCP de los servidores on premise hacia cloud con ADF.
-Creación de scripts en DwH para poder almacenar datos en un servidor del bcp y poder llevalos hacia la nube utilizando Azure data Factory y databrick.
- Creación de pipelines con ADF para los procesos transitorios del banco.
- Uso de databricks para la transformación de los archivos migrados a la capa DDV.
- Uso de jira y bitbucket para la documentación de la iniciativa y poder realizar los pases a producción

experience.title: Analista BI
experience.description: Mis funciones eran las siguientes: - Análisis, desarrollo y soporte de requerimiento BI para el cliente (CLARO)- Uso de herramienta ETL, motores de BBDD, uso de ambientes en DWH, BI.-  Manejo de base de datos para la extracción y manipulación de datos en Oracle
experience.description_html:
Mis funciones eran las siguientes:
- Análisis, desarrollo y soporte de requerimiento BI para el cliente (CLARO)
- Uso de herramienta ETL, motores de BBDD, uso de ambientes en DWH, BI.
- Manejo de base de datos para la extracción y manipulación de datos en Oracle

experience.title: Operador de datos
experience.description: Mis funciones eran las siguientes:- Análisis de datos de los clientes de Entel- Carga de datos a los servidores de Entel- Manejo de Base de datos (SQL Server y Oracle)- Elaboración de querys (cruce de tablas, consultas, vistas, subconsultas) en los gestores de Base de datos-  Elaboración de análisis mediante tablas dinámicas en Excel- Realizar reportes gráficos mediante Power Bi.
experience.description_html:
Mis funciones eran las siguientes:
- Análisis de datos de los clientes de Entel
- Carga de datos a los servidores de Entel
- Manejo de Base de datos (SQL Server y Oracle)
- Elaboración de querys (cruce de tablas, consultas, vistas, subconsultas) en los gestores de Base de datos
- Elaboración de análisis mediante tablas dinámicas en Excel
- Realizar reportes gráficos mediante Power Bi.

matched.match_rationale: Miguel Andre Cornejo Guanilo has a title of Data Engineer Cloud and experience in database and data analysis, which aligns closely with Arpit Kansal's skills in data analysis, SQL, and Python.

detailed_profile.name: Miguel Andre Cornejo Guanilo
detailed_profile.position: Data Engineer Cloud
detailed_profile.about: Ingeniero de Sistemas Computacionales de la universidad privada del norte, cuento con experiencia en base de datos, análisis de datos, soluciones cloud. Me considero una persona seria, responsable, con muchas ganas de trabajar y aprender, con facilidad de adaptación y capacidad de trabajar en equipo, en condiciones de alta presión. Tengo la iniciativa de resolver problemas eficientemente y lograr las metas y objetivos trazados por la empresa. Mi objetivo profesional es poder Desempeñarme, ofrecer y desarrollar todas mis capacidades innatas, consiguiendo un excelente resultado en la labor y el área asignada; además, adquirir a través de la responsabilidad y confianza en mí depositada, una experiencia inigualable, con la cual conseguiré un paso importante en mi superación personal, junto con el orgullo de hacer parte de su equipo de trabajo.

experience.title: Data Engineer
experience.description: - Participación en el proyecto fénix con la migración de data del BCP de los servidores on premise hacia cloud con ADF.-Creación de scripts en DwH para poder almacenar datos en un servidor del bcp y poder llevalos hacia la nube utilizando Azure data Factory y databrick.- Creación de pipelines con ADF para los procesos transitorios del banco.- Uso de databricks para la transformación de los archivos migrados a la capa DDV.- Uso de jira y bitbucket para la documentación de la iniciativa y poder realizar los pases a producción
experience.description_html:
- Participación en el proyecto fénix con la migración de data del BCP de los servidores on premise hacia cloud con ADF.
-Creación de scripts en DwH para poder almacenar datos en un servidor del bcp y poder llevalos hacia la nube utilizando Azure data Factory y databrick.
- Creación de pipelines con ADF para los procesos transitorios del banco.
- Uso de databricks para la transformación de los archivos migrados a la capa DDV.
- Uso de jira y bitbucket para la documentación de la iniciativa y poder realizar los pases a producción

experience.title: Analista BI
experience.description: Mis funciones eran las siguientes: - Análisis, desarrollo y soporte de requerimiento BI para el cliente (CLARO)- Uso de herramienta ETL, motores de BBDD, uso de ambientes en DWH, BI.-  Manejo de base de datos para la extracción y manipulación de datos en Oracle
experience.description_html:
Mis funciones eran las siguientes:
- Análisis, desarrollo y soporte de requerimiento BI para el cliente (CLARO)
- Uso de herramienta ETL, motores de BBDD, uso de ambientes en DWH, BI.
- Manejo de base de datos para la extracción y manipulación de datos en Oracle

experience.title: Operador de datos
experience.description: Mis funciones eran las siguientes:- Análisis de datos de los clientes de Entel- Carga de datos a los servidores de Entel- Manejo de Base de datos (SQL Server y Oracle)- Elaboración de querys (cruce de tablas, consultas, vistas, subconsultas) en los gestores de Base de datos-  Elaboración de análisis mediante tablas dinámicas en Excel- Realizar reportes gráficos mediante Power Bi.
experience.description_html:
Mis funciones eran las siguientes:
- Análisis de datos de los clientes de Entel
- Carga de datos a los servidores de Entel
- Manejo de Base de datos (SQL Server y Oracle)
- Elaboración de querys (cruce de tablas, consultas, vistas, subconsultas) en los gestores de Base de datos
- Elaboración de análisis mediante tablas dinámicas en Excel
- Realizar reportes gráficos mediante Power Bi.

matched.match_rationale: Both have experience in operations management and business development. Kshitij's role as Ops & Strategy Leader aligns closely with Rishi's background in operations.

detailed_profile.name: Kshitij Chandra Prasad
detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

current_company.name: GoTo Group
current_company.title: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth

experience.title: Lead - Product Business Strategy & Operations (Ads)
experience.description: Gojek’s Ads monetization team was a start-up within a unicorn when I joined; over four years, I helped scale it into a multi-million-dollar business.Scaled revenue 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and GTM execution across sales, product, and marketing.Built and led teams of 8–20 across campaign ops, strategy, and design.Created product roadmap and launched 5+ ad products, adding $XM+ monthly revenue.Implemented Tableau reporting for centralized campaign tracking and performance visibility.Launched DSP platform to automate advertiser onboarding and boost self-serve capabilities
experience.description_html:
Gojek’s Ads monetization team was a start-up within a unicorn when I joined; over four years, I helped scale it into a multi-million-dollar business.

Scaled revenue 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and GTM execution across sales, product, and marketing.

Built and led teams of 8–20 across campaign ops, strategy, and design.

Created product roadmap and launched 5+ ad products, adding $XM+ monthly revenue.

Implemented Tableau reporting for centralized campaign tracking and performance visibility.

Launched DSP platform to automate advertiser onboarding and boost self-serve capabilities

experience.title: Manager Sales Operations
experience.description: Fintech SME lender; first start-up role.Reduced loan disbursal time by 50% by co-developing a sales app to streamline document uploads.Improved disbursals by 20% by identifying and fixing revenue leakage in the loan funnel.Led revenue forecasting & territory planning for 100+ field sales reps.Designed and rolled out process improvements in collaboration with product & ops teams.Created dashboards and performance reports for leadership to track sales productivity.
experience.description_html:
Fintech SME lender; first start-up role.

Reduced loan disbursal time by 50% by co-developing a sales app to streamline document uploads.

Improved disbursals by 20% by identifying and fixing revenue leakage in the loan funnel.

Led revenue forecasting & territory planning for 100+ field sales reps.

Designed and rolled out process improvements in collaboration with product & ops teams.

Created dashboards and performance reports for leadership to track sales productivity.

experience.title: Area Sales Manager
experience.description: First post-MBA role in B2B sales.Managed enterprise client accounts and led a field sales team.Achieved consistent sales growth in a competitive market.Developed early expertise in data-driven performance analysis using Excel.
experience.description_html:
First post-MBA role in B2B sales.

Managed enterprise client accounts and led a field sales team.

Achieved consistent sales growth in a competitive market.

Developed early expertise in data-driven performance analysis using Excel.

detailed_profile.name: Miguel Andre Cornejo Guanilo
detailed_profile.position: Data Engineer Cloud
detailed_profile.about: Ingeniero de Sistemas Computacionales de la universidad privada del norte, cuento con experiencia en base de datos, análisis de datos, soluciones cloud. Me considero una persona seria, responsable, con muchas ganas de trabajar y aprender, con facilidad de adaptación y capacidad de trabajar en equipo, en condiciones de alta presión. Tengo la iniciativa de resolver problemas eficientemente y lograr las metas y objetivos trazados por la empresa. Mi objetivo profesional es poder Desempeñarme, ofrecer y desarrollar todas mis capacidades innatas, consiguiendo un excelente resultado en la labor y el área asignada; además, adquirir a través de la responsabilidad y confianza en mí depositada, una experiencia inigualable, con la cual conseguiré un paso importante en mi superación personal, junto con el orgullo de hacer parte de su equipo de trabajo.

experience.title: Data Engineer

detailed_profile.name: Kshitij Chandra Prasad
detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

current_company.name: GoTo Group
current_company.title: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth

experience.title: Lead - Product Business Strategy & Operations (Ads)
experience.description: Gojek’s Ads monetization team was a start-up within a unicorn when I joined; over four years, I helped scale it into a multi-million-dollar business.Scaled revenue 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and GTM execution across sales, product, and marketing.Built and led teams of 8–20 across campaign ops, strategy, and design.Created product roadmap and launched 5+ ad products, adding $XM+ monthly revenue.Implemented Tableau reporting for centralized campaign tracking and performance visibility.Launched DSP platform to automate advertiser onboarding and boost self-serve capabilities

Created dashboards and performance reports for leadership to track sales productivity.

matched.match_rationale: Kshitij Chandra Prasad holds a title of 'Ops & Strategy Leader' and has experience in sales operations, which aligns closely with Dheeraj Kumar Sharma's focus on strategy and operations.

detailed_profile.name: Kshitij Chandra Prasad
detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

detailed_profile.about: Qualified Chartered Accountant with over 20 years of experience in Finance & Accounts, Working Capital Management, Internal Audit & Control and Statutory Compliance. Proven ability to improve operations, impact business growth and maximize profits through achievements in finance management, cost reductions, internal control & productivity improvements. Expertise in formulating & preparing scope of audit, audit plans, audit programme and audit reports with recommendation & suggestion for improvement in internal control system. Ascertain needs and goals, streamline operations and envision new concepts.

detailed_profile.name: Kshitij Chandra Prasad
detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

current_company.name: GoTo Group

detailed_profile.name: Eduardo Crivelari
detailed_profile.position: Executive Leader | Digital Growth & Customer Strategy | Internacional | Produtos & CX
detailed_profile.about: I'm a senior executive with an established track record of leading digital strategies, products, marketing, CX, sales, and sustainable growth in large companies with international operations. I am passionate about transforming business models, scaling operations, and generating real value for customers and shareholders, with a digital mindset, a focus on performance, and a customer-centric vision. Fluent in English, Spanish, and Portuguese. Over more than 15 years, I have led the creation and expansion of innovative digital businesses, leading high-performance multidisciplinary teams in B2B and B2C environments. I have worked in leadership positions in Brazil, Chile, Spain, and other global markets, with a strong emphasis on strategy, innovation, GTM, customer experience, and Customer Success. My deliveries combine strategic vision and disciplined execution, with emphasis on: • Creation and growth of business units with a high impact on revenue and profitability. • Creation of innovative digital businesses, responsible for initiatives of transformation and digitalization of traditional businesses, with a focus on fast and sustainable growth. • Development of new products, responsible for the value proposition and portfolio management. Solid knowledge in internal entrepreneurship, innovation methodology, complex problem solving, and change management. • Experience in planning and execution in Marketing and Brand Management, with special emphasis on digital marketing, such as SEM, SEO, social media, programmatic, affiliate, and marketing automation, executing both inbound marketing and account-based marketing (ABM) strategies. • Design and direct management of go-to-market (GTM) strategies, across sales and relationship channels, including sales executives, telesales, and e-commerce. Operations of field sales, inside sales, and sales development cells (SDR). • Leadership of customer experience (CX), customer success (CS), and customer relationship management (CRM) practices, both on B2C and B2B. • Mastery of digital practices, models, and technologies: personas, customer journey, jobs-to-be-done, design thinking, MVP, co-creation, open digital platforms, SaaS, user experience, data-driven mindset, agile management, scrum, lean, performance cells, and digital stack. • B.Sc. in Naval Engineering (Poli/USP), MBA - Future Executive Program (Santander Group), and certified in Digital Business Strategy (MIT Sloan School of Management). Fluent in English and Spanish.

publications.title: Indian Aviation Sector: The Parallel Rise & Fall
publications.subtitle: IJSER
publications.description: This paper explores profuse reports, statistics, and published papers concerned with the Indian aviation sector from pre-1991 era to the current scenario. With a brief history on the pre-1991 operations in the sector and its players, a detailed outlook on the policy changes of 1991 along the lines of liberalization, open sky policy, green field airport, and FDI is provided. The paper’s cynosure lies on the growth of the aviation sector post-1991 and comparing it with the current failing state of the sector, which is paradoxical. The concurrent rise in demand and fall in supply of the aviation sector is attributed to high taxation on fuel, poor infrastructure, cut-throat competition, a 49% cap on FDI, political interference, incomplete disinvestment, and red tapism. These factors are scrutinized taking examples of Jet Airways, Air India, IndiGo and more, with an aim to provide the reader an insight on where the industry has gone wrong since the post-1991 phase.

detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

Deft in developing & maintaining MIS reports and preparing monthly financial statement. Understanding in formulating budgets and implementing systems / procedures. Expertise in formulating & preparing scope of audit, audit plans, audit programme and audit reports with recommendation & suggestion for improvement in internal control system. Ascertain needs and goals, streamline operations and envision new concepts.

matched.match_rationale: Kshitij Chandra Prasad holds a title of Ops & Strategy Leader and has experience in sales operations, which aligns with Shobhan Modi's role in operations management and strategic planning.

detailed_profile.name: Kshitij Chandra Prasad
detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

detailed_profile.about: Qualified Chartered Accountant with over 20 years of experience in Finance & Accounts, Working Capital Management, Internal Audit & Control and Statutory Compliance. Proven ability to improve operations, impact business growth and maximize profits through achievements in finance management, cost reductions, internal control & productivity improvements. Excels in the maintenance & finalization of accounts, periodic cash flow management and reconciliations and profitability monitoring of internal financial controls. Deft in developing & maintaining MIS reports and preparing monthly financial statement. Understanding in formulating budgets and implementing systems / procedures. Expertise in formulating & preparing scope of audit, audit plans, audit programme and audit reports with recommendation & suggestion for improvement in internal control system. Ascertain needs and goals, streamline operations and envision new concepts.

matched.match_rationale: Kshitij Chandra Prasad has experience as a Manager in Sales Operations, which aligns with Nikhil Khandelwal's role in sales and team leadership. Both have a focus on sales strategy and operations.

detailed_profile.name: Kshitij Chandra Prasad
detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

detailed_profile.position: Manager- Sales Offshore at Aditya Birla Sun Life Asset Management Company with expertise in distribution strategies
detailed_profile.about: At ABSLMF, our team has pioneered innovative digital sales strategies, significantly amplifying the visibility and distribution of mutual fund products through fintech collaborations. With a PGPM in Marketing from IMT Ghaziabad, my approach integrates analytical prowess with distribution expertise, driving us to manage substantial assets and forge enduring business alliances. My tenure as Manager- Sales Offshore is marked by leveraging digital marketing and data analysis to unlock new customer segments, bolstering our market presence. This role synthesizes my educational background in engineering and marketing, enabling me to contribute to the sustainable growth of our digital sales footprint in a dynamic financial landscape.

experience.title: Manager- Offshore Sales
experience.description: Business Development & Marketing Specialist | Global Asset ManagementAs a specialist in asset management, I drive growth, ensure compliance, and optimize operations to meet client and market needs. My role involves blending strategic foresight with actionable insights to deliver impactful results.🔑 Key Responsibilities:1. Market Analysis & Reporting:-Conduct in-depth product analyses and create tailored market reports for investors. as well as for the board to review the fund performance.-Develop event-based notes to enhance client awareness and engagement.2. Strategic Fund Promotion:-Design and implement strategies to promote funds among offshore clients.-Ensure compliance for GIFT City-based funds in collaboration with regulatory bodies.3. Client Acquisition & Management:-Expand the client base to include sovereign wealth funds, institutions, HNIs, and family offices.-Build and nurture relationships with distributors serving NRIs and OCIs to ensure seamless service delivery.4. Marketing & Communications:-Drive impactful LinkedIn campaigns and execute ATL/BTL marketing strategies.-Craft clear and engaging marketing messages to resonate with diverse audiences.5. Operational Excellence:-Streamline business operations to improve efficiency and ensure compliance.-Implement best practices to maintain excellence in service delivery.Key Achievements:-Enhanced offshore client engagement through strategic fund promotion initiatives.-Delivered actionable insights that supported critical investment decisions.-Strengthened operational frameworks to comply with evolving regulations and market standards.I am passionate about leveraging insights, fostering strong client relationships, and delivering tailored financial solutions to create value for clients and stakeholders.
experience.description_html:
Business Development & Marketing Specialist | Global Asset Management

As a specialist in asset management, I drive growth, ensure compliance, and optimize operations to meet client and market needs. My role involves blending strategic foresight with actionable insights to deliver impactful results.

🔑 Key Responsibilities:
1. Market Analysis & Reporting:
-Conduct in-depth product analyses and create tailored market reports for investors. as well as for the board to review the fund performance.
-Develop event-based notes to enhance client awareness and engagement.

2. Strategic Fund Promotion:
-Design and implement strategies to promote funds among offshore clients.
-Ensure compliance for GIFT City-based funds in collaboration with regulatory bodies.

3. Client Acquisition & Management:
-Expand the client base to include sovereign wealth funds, institutions, HNIs, and family offices.
-Build and nurture relationships with distributors serving NRIs and OCIs to ensure seamless service delivery.

4. Marketing & Communications:
-Drive impactful LinkedIn campaigns and execute ATL/BTL marketing strategies.
-Craft clear and engaging marketing messages to resonate with diverse audiences.

5. Operational Excellence:
-Streamline business operations to improve efficiency and ensure compliance.
-Implement best practices to maintain excellence in service delivery.

Key Achievements:
-Enhanced offshore client engagement through strategic fund promotion initiatives.
-Delivered actionable insights that supported critical investment decisions.
-Strengthened operational frameworks to comply with evolving regulations and market standards.

I am passionate about leveraging insights, fostering strong client relationships, and delivering tailored financial solutions to create value for clients and stakeholders.

experience.title: Digital Sales Manager
experience.description: Digital Sales & Partnerships Specialist | Mutual Funds & Investment Solutions As a specialist in digital sales, I focus on leveraging fintech platforms and digital innovation to drive the growth and distribution of mutual fund products. My expertise lies in crafting impactful strategies, building partnerships, and optimizing performance for exceptional outcomes. 🔑 Key Responsibilities:1. Develop and execute a sales strategy to maximize mutual fund distribution through fintech platforms and digital channels.2. Cultivate partnerships with fintech players, digital wallets, and online brokers to expand reach and visibility.3. Drive customer acquisition by leveraging digital marketing, data analytics, and customer segmentation.4. Design and implement innovative campaigns to boost awareness, consideration, and conversions for mutual fund products.5. Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activities to identify opportunities for product differentiation.6. Provide training and tools to sales teams and channel partners, ensuring effective promotion and sales of mutual fund offerings.7. Monitor KPIs like AUM growth, SIP acquisition, and customer retention, devising strategies to exceed targets.8. Stay updated on industry regulations and digital trends to ensure compliance and maintain ethical standards.Key Achievements:-Expanded product reach through strategic fintech partnerships, driving notable AUM and SIP growth.-Launched targeted campaigns that significantly improved customer acquisition and retention.-Delivered actionable insights to position products uniquely in a competitive market. I am passionate about transforming mutual fund distribution through technology and strategic partnerships, creating value for investors and stakeholders.
experience.description_html:
Digital Sales & Partnerships Specialist | Mutual Funds & Investment Solutions

As a specialist in digital sales, I focus on leveraging fintech platforms and digital innovation to drive the growth and distribution of mutual fund products. My expertise lies in crafting impactful strategies, building partnerships, and optimizing performance for exceptional outcomes.

🔑 Key Responsibilities:
1. Develop and execute a sales strategy to maximize mutual fund distribution through fintech platforms and digital channels.
2. Cultivate partnerships with fintech players, digital wallets, and online brokers to expand reach and visibility.
3. Drive customer acquisition by leveraging digital marketing, data analytics, and customer segmentation.
4. Design and implement innovative campaigns to boost awareness, consideration, and conversions for mutual fund products.
5. Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activities to identify opportunities for product differentiation.
6. Provide training and tools to sales teams and channel partners, ensuring effective promotion and sales of mutual fund offerings.
7. Monitor KPIs like AUM growth, SIP acquisition, and customer retention, devising strategies to exceed targets.
8. Stay updated on industry regulations and digital trends to ensure compliance and maintain ethical standards.


Key Achievements:
-Expanded product reach through strategic fintech partnerships, driving notable AUM and SIP growth.
-Launched targeted campaigns that significantly improved customer acquisition and retention.
-Delivered actionable insights to position products uniquely in a competitive market.

I am passionate about transforming mutual fund distribution through technology and strategic partnerships, creating value for investors and stakeholders.

detailed_profile.name: Kshitij Chandra Prasad
detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

current_company.name: GoTo Group
current_company.title: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth

detailed_profile.about: At ABSLMF, our team has pioneered innovative digital sales strategies, significantly amplifying the visibility and distribution of mutual fund products through fintech collaborations. With a PGPM in Marketing from IMT Ghaziabad, my approach integrates analytical prowess with distribution expertise, driving us to manage substantial assets and forge enduring business alliances. My tenure as Manager- Sales Offshore is marked by leveraging digital marketing and data analysis to unlock new customer segments, bolstering our market presence. This role synthesizes my educational background in engineering and marketing, enabling me to contribute to the sustainable growth of our digital sales footprint in a dynamic financial landscape.

experience.title: Manager- Offshore Sales
experience.description: Business Development & Marketing Specialist | Global Asset ManagementAs a specialist in asset management, I drive growth, ensure compliance, and optimize operations to meet client and market needs. My role involves blending strategic foresight with actionable insights to deliver impactful results.🔑 Key Responsibilities:1. Market Analysis & Reporting:-Conduct in-depth product analyses and create tailored market reports for investors. as well as for the board to review the fund performance.-Develop event-based notes to enhance client awareness and engagement.2. Strategic Fund Promotion:-Design and implement strategies to promote funds among offshore clients.-Ensure compliance for GIFT City-based funds in collaboration with regulatory bodies.3. Client Acquisition & Management:-Expand the client base to include sovereign wealth funds, institutions, HNIs, and family offices.-Build and nurture relationships with distributors serving NRIs and OCIs to ensure seamless service delivery.4. Marketing & Communications:-Drive impactful LinkedIn campaigns and execute ATL/BTL marketing strategies.-Craft clear and engaging marketing messages to resonate with diverse audiences.5. Operational Excellence:-Streamline business operations to improve efficiency and ensure compliance.-Implement best practices to maintain excellence in service delivery.Key Achievements:-Enhanced offshore client engagement through strategic fund promotion initiatives.-Delivered actionable insights that supported critical investment decisions.-Strengthened operational frameworks to comply with evolving regulations and market standards.I am passionate about leveraging insights, fostering strong client relationships, and delivering tailored financial solutions to create value for clients and stakeholders.
experience.description_html:
Business Development & Marketing Specialist | Global Asset Management

As a specialist in asset management, I drive growth, ensure compliance, and optimize operations to meet client and market needs. My role involves blending strategic foresight with actionable insights to deliver impactful results.

🔑 Key Responsibilities:
1. Market Analysis & Reporting:
-Conduct in-depth product analyses and create tailored market reports for investors. as well as for the board to review the fund performance.
-Develop event-based notes to enhance client awareness and engagement.

2. Strategic Fund Promotion:
-Design and implement strategies to promote funds among offshore clients.
-Ensure compliance for GIFT City-based funds in collaboration with regulatory bodies.

3. Client Acquisition & Management:
-Expand the client base to include sovereign wealth funds, institutions, HNIs, and family offices.
-Build and nurture relationships with distributors serving NRIs and OCIs to ensure seamless service delivery.

4. Marketing & Communications:
-Drive impactful LinkedIn campaigns and execute ATL/BTL marketing strategies.
-Craft clear and engaging marketing messages to resonate with diverse audiences.

5. Operational Excellence:
-Streamline business operations to improve efficiency and ensure compliance.
-Implement best practices to maintain excellence in service delivery.

Key Achievements:
-Enhanced offshore client engagement through strategic fund promotion initiatives.
-Delivered actionable insights that supported critical investment decisions.
-Strengthened operational frameworks to comply with evolving regulations and market standards.

I am passionate about leveraging insights, fostering strong client relationships, and delivering tailored financial solutions to create value for clients and stakeholders.
experience.company: Aditya Birla Sun Life Asset Management Company Ltd. (International)

experience.title: Digital Sales Manager
experience.description: Digital Sales & Partnerships Specialist | Mutual Funds & Investment Solutions As a specialist in digital sales, I focus on leveraging fintech platforms and digital innovation to drive the growth and distribution of mutual fund products. My expertise lies in crafting impactful strategies, building partnerships, and optimizing performance for exceptional outcomes. 🔑 Key Responsibilities:1. Develop and execute a sales strategy to maximize mutual fund distribution through fintech platforms and digital channels.2. Cultivate partnerships with fintech players, digital wallets, and online brokers to expand reach and visibility.3. Drive customer acquisition by leveraging digital marketing, data analytics, and customer segmentation.4. Design and implement innovative campaigns to boost awareness, consideration, and conversions for mutual fund products.5. Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activities to identify opportunities for product differentiation.6. Provide training and tools to sales teams and channel partners, ensuring effective promotion and sales of mutual fund offerings.7. Monitor KPIs like AUM growth, SIP acquisition, and customer retention, devising strategies to exceed targets.8. Stay updated on industry regulations and digital trends to ensure compliance and maintain ethical standards.Key Achievements:-Expanded product reach through strategic fintech partnerships, driving notable AUM and SIP growth.-Launched targeted campaigns that significantly improved customer acquisition and retention.-Delivered actionable insights to position products uniquely in a competitive market. I am passionate about transforming mutual fund distribution through technology and strategic partnerships, creating value for investors and stakeholders.
experience.description_html:
Digital Sales & Partnerships Specialist | Mutual Funds & Investment Solutions

As a specialist in digital sales, I focus on leveraging fintech platforms and digital innovation to drive the growth and distribution of mutual fund products. My expertise lies in crafting impactful strategies, building partnerships, and optimizing performance for exceptional outcomes.

🔑 Key Responsibilities:
1. Develop and execute a sales strategy to maximize mutual fund distribution through fintech platforms and digital channels.
2. Cultivate partnerships with fintech players, digital wallets, and online brokers to expand reach and visibility.
3. Drive customer acquisition by leveraging digital marketing, data analytics, and customer segmentation.
4. Design and implement innovative campaigns to boost awareness, consideration, and conversions for mutual fund products.
5. Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activities to identify opportunities for product differentiation.
6. Provide training and tools to sales teams and channel partners, ensuring effective promotion and sales of mutual fund offerings.
7. Monitor KPIs like AUM growth, SIP acquisition, and customer retention, devising strategies to exceed targets.
8. Stay updated on industry regulations and digital trends to ensure compliance and maintain ethical standards.


Key Achievements:
-Expanded product reach through strategic fintech partnerships, driving notable AUM and SIP growth.
-Launched targeted campaigns that significantly improved customer acquisition and retention.
-Delivered actionable insights to position products uniquely in a competitive market.

I am passionate about transforming mutual fund distribution through technology and strategic partnerships, creating value for investors and stakeholders.

detailed_profile.name: Kshitij Chandra Prasad
detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

matched.match_rationale: Kshitij Chandra Prasad has experience in sales operations and strategy, which aligns with Gaurav Srivastava's role in sales strategy and leadership.

detailed_profile.name: Kshitij Chandra Prasad
detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

current_company.name: GoTo Group
current_company.title: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth

experience.title: Lead - Product Business Strategy & Operations (Ads)
experience.description: Gojek’s Ads monetization team was a start-up within a unicorn when I joined; over four years, I helped scale it into a multi-million-dollar business.Scaled revenue 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and GTM execution across sales, product, and marketing.Built and led teams of 8–20 across campaign ops, strategy, and design.Created product roadmap and launched 5+ ad products, adding $XM+ monthly revenue.Implemented Tableau reporting for centralized campaign tracking and performance visibility.Launched DSP platform to automate advertiser onboarding and boost self-serve capabilities
experience.description_html:
Gojek’s Ads monetization team was a start-up within a unicorn when I joined; over four years, I helped scale it into a multi-million-dollar business.

Scaled revenue 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and GTM execution across sales, product, and marketing.

Built and led teams of 8–20 across campaign ops, strategy, and design.

Created product roadmap and launched 5+ ad products, adding $XM+ monthly revenue.

Implemented Tableau reporting for centralized campaign tracking and performance visibility.

Launched DSP platform to automate advertiser onboarding and boost self-serve capabilities

experience.title: Manager Sales Operations
experience.description: Fintech SME lender; first start-up role.Reduced loan disbursal time by 50% by co-developing a sales app to streamline document uploads.Improved disbursals by 20% by identifying and fixing revenue leakage in the loan funnel.Led revenue forecasting & territory planning for 100+ field sales reps.Designed and rolled out process improvements in collaboration with product & ops teams.Created dashboards and performance reports for leadership to track sales productivity.
experience.description_html:
Fintech SME lender; first start-up role.

Reduced loan disbursal time by 50% by co-developing a sales app to streamline document uploads.

Improved disbursals by 20% by identifying and fixing revenue leakage in the loan funnel.

Led revenue forecasting & territory planning for 100+ field sales reps.

Designed and rolled out process improvements in collaboration with product & ops teams.

Created dashboards and performance reports for leadership to track sales productivity.

experience.title: Area Sales Manager
experience.description: First post-MBA role in B2B sales.Managed enterprise client accounts and led a field sales team.Achieved consistent sales growth in a competitive market.Developed early expertise in data-driven performance analysis using Excel.

detailed_profile.name: Kshitij Chandra Prasad
detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

As the Co-Founder of Imprint Studio, I specialize in creating dynamic CGI, anamorphic ads, motion graphics, and memorable TV commercials that captivate audiences and amplify brand stories.🚀 Beyond the creative, I lead our Marketing Strategy and Brand Development, aligning each project with our client's goals in today’s fast-paced media landscape. I'm excited to connect with like-minded professionals and explore new, innovative collaborations to push creative boundaries. Let’s connect and make bold ideas a reality!🤝

publications.title: Indian Aviation Sector: The Parallel Rise & Fall
publications.subtitle: IJSER
publications.description: This paper explores profuse reports, statistics, and published papers concerned with the Indian aviation sector from pre-1991 era to the current scenario. With a brief history on the pre-1991 operations in the sector and its players, a detailed outlook on the policy changes of 1991 along the lines of liberalization, open sky policy, green field airport, and FDI is provided. The paper’s cynosure lies on the growth of the aviation sector post-1991 and comparing it with the current failing state of the sector, which is paradoxical. The concurrent rise in demand and fall in supply of the aviation sector is attributed to high taxation on fuel, poor infrastructure, cut-throat competition, a 49% cap on FDI, political interference, incomplete disinvestment, and red tapism. These factors are scrutinized taking examples of Jet Airways, Air India, IndiGo and more, with an aim to provide the reader an insight on where the industry has gone wrong since the post-1991 phase.

recommendations: Yong Hao Phoy “During my time as Regional Head of Commercial for C2B and B2C businesses at Carsome, I worked closely with Piyush Palkar. His expertise in analytics, AI/ML-driven innovations, and leadership as Chief Data Officer played a key role in driving important initiatives for the company. We worked together to establish a uniform pricing strategy, including the Buyer Calculator for purchase and an Automated Retail Pricing Strategy, ensuring consistency and scalability for both C2B and B2C businesses. Piyush also led the design and implementation of an automated data monitoring process, which improved efficiency and provided valuable insights for decision-making. Working with Piyush was a great experience, and I truly value his expertise, leadership, and teamwork.”

Priyanka Harlalka “Piyush was a wonderful manager to work with, and has great expertise in leadership, mentoring, motivation. He was very supportive and always encouraged to learn new tools and technology. He's very much a hands-on manager and always had a clear understanding of business requirements. Even in tight deadlines and in a situation of crisis, he was always there guiding us, and not losing his cool. Very focused, dedicated and always carried a positive attitude towards work and his subordinates. Keep up the good work! Hope to work together in the future.”

recommendations: Yong Hao Phoy “During my time as Regional Head of Commercial for C2B and B2C businesses at Carsome, I worked closely with Piyush Palkar. His expertise in analytics, AI/ML-driven innovations, and leadership as Chief Data Officer played a key role in driving important initiatives for the company. We worked together to establish a uniform pricing strategy, including the Buyer Calculator for purchase and an Automated Retail Pricing Strategy, ensuring consistency and scalability for both C2B and B2C businesses. Piyush also led the design and implementation of an automated data monitoring process, which improved efficiency and provided valuable insights for decision-making. Working with Piyush was a great experience, and I truly value his expertise, leadership, and teamwork.”

Priyanka Harlalka “Piyush was a wonderful manager to work with, and has great expertise in leadership, mentoring, motivation. He was very supportive and always encouraged to learn new tools and technology. He's very much a hands-on manager and always had a clear understanding of business requirements. Even in tight deadlines and in a situation of crisis, he was always there guiding us, and not losing his cool. Very focused, dedicated and always carried a positive attitude towards work and his subordinates. Keep up the good work! Hope to work together in the future.”

volunteer_experience.info: The Global CDO Ambassador Program provides a partnership between the CDO Ambassador, MIT CDOIQ Symposium, International Society of Chief Data Officers, Institute for Chief Data Officers, and CDO Magazine. https://cdoiq.mit.edu/https://iscdo.org/https://www.cdomagazine.tech/The vision of the program is to create and grow a global CDO community of data champions with the following primary objectives:> Empower Global CDO Ambassadors to build, champion, and… Show more The Global CDO Ambassador Program provides a partnership between the CDO Ambassador, MIT CDOIQ Symposium, International Society of Chief Data Officers, Institute for Chief Data Officers, and CDO Magazine. https://cdoiq.mit.edu/https://iscdo.org/https://www.cdomagazine.tech/The vision of the program is to create and grow a global CDO community of data champions with the following primary objectives:> Empower Global CDO Ambassadors to build, champion, and deliver data value to their constituents> Exchange ideas, success stories, and lessons learned> Develop and authentic, informal, and informative community of CDOs, by CDOs, and for CDOs> Serve as a platform for CDOs to elevate the value of data assets for their organizations > Disseminate knowledge to the data management community through the four founding organizations listed above> Recognize outstanding commitment of community members with Country CDO Ambassador awards Show less

recommendations: Yong Hao Phoy “During my time as Regional Head of Commercial for C2B and B2C businesses at Carsome, I worked closely with Piyush Palkar. His expertise in analytics, AI/ML-driven innovations, and leadership as Chief Data Officer played a key role in driving important initiatives for the company. We worked together to establish a uniform pricing strategy, including the Buyer Calculator for purchase and an Automated Retail Pricing Strategy, ensuring consistency and scalability for both C2B and B2C businesses. Piyush also led the design and implementation of an automated data monitoring process, which improved efficiency and provided valuable insights for decision-making. Working with Piyush was a great experience, and I truly value his expertise, leadership, and teamwork.”

Priyanka Harlalka “Piyush was a wonderful manager to work with, and has great expertise in leadership, mentoring, motivation. He was very supportive and always encouraged to learn new tools and technology. He's very much a hands-on manager and always had a clear understanding of business requirements. Even in tight deadlines and in a situation of crisis, he was always there guiding us, and not losing his cool. Very focused, dedicated and always carried a positive attitude towards work and his subordinates. Keep up the good work! Hope to work together in the future.”

detailed_profile.name: Kshitij Chandra Prasad
detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

current_company.name: GoTo Group
current_company.title: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth

detailed_profile.position: Manager- Sales Offshore at Aditya Birla Sun Life Asset Management Company with expertise in distribution strategies
detailed_profile.about: At ABSLMF, our team has pioneered innovative digital sales strategies, significantly amplifying the visibility and distribution of mutual fund products through fintech collaborations. With a PGPM in Marketing from IMT Ghaziabad, my approach integrates analytical prowess with distribution expertise, driving us to manage substantial assets and forge enduring business alliances. My tenure as Manager- Sales Offshore is marked by leveraging digital marketing and data analysis to unlock new customer segments, bolstering our market presence. This role synthesizes my educational background in engineering and marketing, enabling me to contribute to the sustainable growth of our digital sales footprint in a dynamic financial landscape.

current_company.title: Manager- Offshore Sales

experience.title: Manager- Offshore Sales
experience.description: Business Development & Marketing Specialist | Global Asset ManagementAs a specialist in asset management, I drive growth, ensure compliance, and optimize operations to meet client and market needs. My role involves blending strategic foresight with actionable insights to deliver impactful results.🔑 Key Responsibilities:1. Market Analysis & Reporting:-Conduct in-depth product analyses and create tailored market reports for investors. as well as for the board to review the fund performance.-Develop event-based notes to enhance client awareness and engagement.2. Strategic Fund Promotion:-Design and implement strategies to promote funds among offshore clients.-Ensure compliance for GIFT City-based funds in collaboration with regulatory bodies.3. Client Acquisition & Management:-Expand the client base to include sovereign wealth funds, institutions, HNIs, and family offices.-Build and nurture relationships with distributors serving NRIs and OCIs to ensure seamless service delivery.4. Marketing & Communications:-Drive impactful LinkedIn campaigns and execute ATL/BTL marketing strategies.-Craft clear and engaging marketing messages to resonate with diverse audiences.5. Operational Excellence:-Streamline business operations to improve efficiency and ensure compliance.-Implement best practices to maintain excellence in service delivery.Key Achievements:-Enhanced offshore client engagement through strategic fund promotion initiatives.-Delivered actionable insights that supported critical investment decisions.-Strengthened operational frameworks to comply with evolving regulations and market standards.I am passionate about leveraging insights, fostering strong client relationships, and delivering tailored financial solutions to create value for clients and stakeholders.
experience.description_html:
Business Development & Marketing Specialist | Global Asset Management

As a specialist in asset management, I drive growth, ensure compliance, and optimize operations to meet client and market needs. My role involves blending strategic foresight with actionable insights to deliver impactful results.

🔑 Key Responsibilities:
1. Market Analysis & Reporting:
-Conduct in-depth product analyses and create tailored market reports for investors. as well as for the board to review the fund performance.
-Develop event-based notes to enhance client awareness and engagement.

2. Strategic Fund Promotion:
-Design and implement strategies to promote funds among offshore clients.
-Ensure compliance for GIFT City-based funds in collaboration with regulatory bodies.

3. Client Acquisition & Management:
-Expand the client base to include sovereign wealth funds, institutions, HNIs, and family offices.
-Build and nurture relationships with distributors serving NRIs and OCIs to ensure seamless service delivery.

4. Marketing & Communications:
-Drive impactful LinkedIn campaigns and execute ATL/BTL marketing strategies.
-Craft clear and engaging marketing messages to resonate with diverse audiences.

5. Operational Excellence:
-Streamline business operations to improve efficiency and ensure compliance.
-Implement best practices to maintain excellence in service delivery.

Key Achievements:
-Enhanced offshore client engagement through strategic fund promotion initiatives.
-Delivered actionable insights that supported critical investment decisions.
-Strengthened operational frameworks to comply with evolving regulations and market standards.

I am passionate about leveraging insights, fostering strong client relationships, and delivering tailored financial solutions to create value for clients and stakeholders.
experience.company: Aditya Birla Sun Life Asset Management Company Ltd. (International)

experience.title: Digital Sales Manager
experience.description: Digital Sales & Partnerships Specialist | Mutual Funds & Investment Solutions As a specialist in digital sales, I focus on leveraging fintech platforms and digital innovation to drive the growth and distribution of mutual fund products. My expertise lies in crafting impactful strategies, building partnerships, and optimizing performance for exceptional outcomes. 🔑 Key Responsibilities:1. Develop and execute a sales strategy to maximize mutual fund distribution through fintech platforms and digital channels.2. Cultivate partnerships with fintech players, digital wallets, and online brokers to expand reach and visibility.3. Drive customer acquisition by leveraging digital marketing, data analytics, and customer segmentation.4. Design and implement innovative campaigns to boost awareness, consideration, and conversions for mutual fund products.5. Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activities to identify opportunities for product differentiation.6. Provide training and tools to sales teams and channel partners, ensuring effective promotion and sales of mutual fund offerings.7. Monitor KPIs like AUM growth, SIP acquisition, and customer retention, devising strategies to exceed targets.8. Stay updated on industry regulations and digital trends to ensure compliance and maintain ethical standards.Key Achievements:-Expanded product reach through strategic fintech partnerships, driving notable AUM and SIP growth.-Launched targeted campaigns that significantly improved customer acquisition and retention.-Delivered actionable insights to position products uniquely in a competitive market. I am passionate about transforming mutual fund distribution through technology and strategic partnerships, creating value for investors and stakeholders.
experience.description_html:
Digital Sales & Partnerships Specialist | Mutual Funds & Investment Solutions

As a specialist in digital sales, I focus on leveraging fintech platforms and digital innovation to drive the growth and distribution of mutual fund products. My expertise lies in crafting impactful strategies, building partnerships, and optimizing performance for exceptional outcomes.

🔑 Key Responsibilities:
1. Develop and execute a sales strategy to maximize mutual fund distribution through fintech platforms and digital channels.
2. Cultivate partnerships with fintech players, digital wallets, and online brokers to expand reach and visibility.
3. Drive customer acquisition by leveraging digital marketing, data analytics, and customer segmentation.
4. Design and implement innovative campaigns to boost awareness, consideration, and conversions for mutual fund products.
5. Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activities to identify opportunities for product differentiation.
6. Provide training and tools to sales teams and channel partners, ensuring effective promotion and sales of mutual fund offerings.
7. Monitor KPIs like AUM growth, SIP acquisition, and customer retention, devising strategies to exceed targets.
8. Stay updated on industry regulations and digital trends to ensure compliance and maintain ethical standards.


Key Achievements:
-Expanded product reach through strategic fintech partnerships, driving notable AUM and SIP growth.
-Launched targeted campaigns that significantly improved customer acquisition and retention.
-Delivered actionable insights to position products uniquely in a competitive market.

I am passionate about transforming mutual fund distribution through technology and strategic partnerships, creating value for investors and stakeholders.
