recommendations: Yong Hao Phoy “During my time as Regional Head of Commercial for C2B and B2C businesses at Carsome, I worked closely with Piyush Palkar. His expertise in analytics, AI/ML-driven innovations, and leadership as Chief Data Officer played a key role in driving important initiatives for the company. We worked together to establish a uniform pricing strategy, including the Buyer Calculator for purchase and an Automated Retail Pricing Strategy, ensuring consistency and scalability for both C2B and B2C businesses. Piyush also led the design and implementation of an automated data monitoring process, which improved efficiency and provided valuable insights for decision-making. Working with Piyush was a great experience, and I truly value his expertise, leadership, and teamwork.”

Priyanka Harlalka “Piyush was a wonderful manager to work with, and has great expertise in leadership, mentoring, motivation. He was very supportive and always encouraged to learn new tools and technology. He's very much a hands-on manager and always had a clear understanding of business requirements. Even in tight deadlines and in a situation of crisis, he was always there guiding us, and not losing his cool. Very focused, dedicated and always carried a positive attitude towards work and his subordinates. Keep up the good work! Hope to work together in the future.”

volunteer_experience.info: The Global CDO Ambassador Program provides a partnership between the CDO Ambassador, MIT CDOIQ Symposium, International Society of Chief Data Officers, Institute for Chief Data Officers, and CDO Magazine. https://cdoiq.mit.edu/https://iscdo.org/https://www.cdomagazine.tech/The vision of the program is to create and grow a global CDO community of data champions with the following primary objectives:> Empower Global CDO Ambassadors to build, champion, and… Show more The Global CDO Ambassador Program provides a partnership between the CDO Ambassador, MIT CDOIQ Symposium, International Society of Chief Data Officers, Institute for Chief Data Officers, and CDO Magazine. https://cdoiq.mit.edu/https://iscdo.org/https://www.cdomagazine.tech/The vision of the program is to create and grow a global CDO community of data champions with the following primary objectives:> Empower Global CDO Ambassadors to build, champion, and deliver data value to their constituents> Exchange ideas, success stories, and lessons learned> Develop and authentic, informal, and informative community of CDOs, by CDOs, and for CDOs> Serve as a platform for CDOs to elevate the value of data assets for their organizations > Disseminate knowledge to the data management community through the four founding organizations listed above> Recognize outstanding commitment of community members with Country CDO Ambassador awards Show less

detailed_profile.name: Miguel Andre Cornejo Guanilo
detailed_profile.position: Data Engineer Cloud
detailed_profile.about: Ingeniero de Sistemas Computacionales de la universidad privada del norte, cuento con experiencia en base de datos, análisis de datos, soluciones cloud. Me considero una persona seria, responsable, con muchas ganas de trabajar y aprender, con facilidad de adaptación y capacidad de trabajar en equipo, en condiciones de alta presión. Tengo la iniciativa de resolver problemas eficientemente y lograr las metas y objetivos trazados por la empresa. Mi objetivo profesional es poder Desempeñarme, ofrecer y desarrollar todas mis capacidades innatas, consiguiendo un excelente resultado en la labor y el área asignada; además, adquirir a través de la responsabilidad y confianza en mí depositada, una experiencia inigualable, con la cual conseguiré un paso importante en mi superación personal, junto con el orgullo de hacer parte de su equipo de trabajo.

experience.title: Data Engineer
experience.description: - Participación en el proyecto fénix con la migración de data del BCP de los servidores on premise hacia cloud con ADF.-Creación de scripts en DwH para poder almacenar datos en un servidor del bcp y poder llevalos hacia la nube utilizando Azure data Factory y databrick.- Creación de pipelines con ADF para los procesos transitorios del banco.- Uso de databricks para la transformación de los archivos migrados a la capa DDV.- Uso de jira y bitbucket para la documentación de la iniciativa y poder realizar los pases a producción
experience.description_html:
- Participación en el proyecto fénix con la migración de data del BCP de los servidores on premise hacia cloud con ADF.
-Creación de scripts en DwH para poder almacenar datos en un servidor del bcp y poder llevalos hacia la nube utilizando Azure data Factory y databrick.
- Creación de pipelines con ADF para los procesos transitorios del banco.
- Uso de databricks para la transformación de los archivos migrados a la capa DDV.
- Uso de jira y bitbucket para la documentación de la iniciativa y poder realizar los pases a producción

detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

current_company.name: GoTo Group
current_company.title: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth

experience.title: Lead - Product Business Strategy & Operations (Ads)

detailed_profile.name: Sandhya Somu
detailed_profile.city: Quatre Bornes, Plaines Wilhems District, Mauritius
detailed_profile.position: MarTech Associate | Financial Accounting | NUS MiM'22
detailed_profile.about: With a Master's degree in Management from NUS Business School and a Bachelor's degree in Accounting and Finance, I have a strong academic background in both business and finance domains. I have also acquired multiple certifications in Microsoft Excel and Fundamentals of Digital Marketing, demonstrating my continuous learning and skill development. As a Marketing Analyst and Reporting Intern at GLG, I applied my analytical and marketing skills to conduct research, generate reports and provide insights on various topics and industries. Previously, as a project director at NUS Indian Cultural Society and a team leader at AIESEC in Chennai, I led and coordinated a team of volunteers to organize and execute cultural programs and activities, enhancing my leadership, teamwork and event management skills. I am passionate about learning new things and adapting to changing environments. I believe that the willingness and ability to learn is a crucial skill in today's dynamic world. I am eager to work in the field of digital marketing, finance, accounting, or management, where I can leverage my analytical, creative, and problem-solving abilities to deliver value and results as well as provide my knowledge and interests to contribute to the success of the organization and the society. Please feel free to reach out to me at sandhyahsv@gmail.com.

experience.title: Marketing Analyst and Reporting Intern
experience.description: Worked together with APAC Marketing Campaign Manager and her team on tracking and measuring the campaign metric, reporting the campaign numbers, creating email campaigns.• Developed a monthly PowerPoint Dashboard for India, China, Japan, SEA (Greater China, North and South Asia Region) to track 7 monthly digest, Corp Webcast and Ad hoc Campaign Reporting which help understand product performance.• Created YoY, YTD and region-wise comparison for specific Surveys and Campaigns• Tracked Website UTM for all the monthly digest• Engaged Salesforce lead reports to aid sales department in easier identification of potential client touchpoints

detailed_profile.name: Kshitij Chandra Prasad
detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

recommendations: Yong Hao Phoy “During my time as Regional Head of Commercial for C2B and B2C businesses at Carsome, I worked closely with Piyush Palkar. His expertise in analytics, AI/ML-driven innovations, and leadership as Chief Data Officer played a key role in driving important initiatives for the company. We worked together to establish a uniform pricing strategy, including the Buyer Calculator for purchase and an Automated Retail Pricing Strategy, ensuring consistency and scalability for both C2B and B2C businesses. Piyush also led the design and implementation of an automated data monitoring process, which improved efficiency and provided valuable insights for decision-making. Working with Piyush was a great experience, and I truly value his expertise, leadership, and teamwork.”

Priyanka Harlalka “Piyush was a wonderful manager to work with, and has great expertise in leadership, mentoring, motivation. He was very supportive and always encouraged to learn new tools and technology. He's very much a hands-on manager and always had a clear understanding of business requirements. Even in tight deadlines and in a situation of crisis, he was always there guiding us, and not losing his cool. Very focused, dedicated and always carried a positive attitude towards work and his subordinates. Keep up the good work! Hope to work together in the future.”

matched.match_rationale: Kshitij Chandra Prasad has a background in sales operations and strategy, which aligns closely with Rajnish Sah's expertise in sales strategy and business development.

detailed_profile.name: Kshitij Chandra Prasad
detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

current_company.name: GoTo Group
current_company.title: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth

recommendations: Yong Hao Phoy “During my time as Regional Head of Commercial for C2B and B2C businesses at Carsome, I worked closely with Piyush Palkar. His expertise in analytics, AI/ML-driven innovations, and leadership as Chief Data Officer played a key role in driving important initiatives for the company. We worked together to establish a uniform pricing strategy, including the Buyer Calculator for purchase and an Automated Retail Pricing Strategy, ensuring consistency and scalability for both C2B and B2C businesses. Piyush also led the design and implementation of an automated data monitoring process, which improved efficiency and provided valuable insights for decision-making. Working with Piyush was a great experience, and I truly value his expertise, leadership, and teamwork.”

Priyanka Harlalka “Piyush was a wonderful manager to work with, and has great expertise in leadership, mentoring, motivation. He was very supportive and always encouraged to learn new tools and technology. He's very much a hands-on manager and always had a clear understanding of business requirements. Even in tight deadlines and in a situation of crisis, he was always there guiding us, and not losing his cool. Very focused, dedicated and always carried a positive attitude towards work and his subordinates. Keep up the good work! Hope to work together in the future.”

volunteer_experience.info: The Global CDO Ambassador Program provides a partnership between the CDO Ambassador, MIT CDOIQ Symposium, International Society of Chief Data Officers, Institute for Chief Data Officers, and CDO Magazine. https://cdoiq.mit.edu/https://iscdo.org/https://www.cdomagazine.tech/The vision of the program is to create and grow a global CDO community of data champions with the following primary objectives:> Empower Global CDO Ambassadors to build, champion, and… Show more The Global CDO Ambassador Program provides a partnership between the CDO Ambassador, MIT CDOIQ Symposium, International Society of Chief Data Officers, Institute for Chief Data Officers, and CDO Magazine. https://cdoiq.mit.edu/https://iscdo.org/https://www.cdomagazine.tech/The vision of the program is to create and grow a global CDO community of data champions with the following primary objectives:> Empower Global CDO Ambassadors to build, champion, and deliver data value to their constituents> Exchange ideas, success stories, and lessons learned> Develop and authentic, informal, and informative community of CDOs, by CDOs, and for CDOs> Serve as a platform for CDOs to elevate the value of data assets for their organizations > Disseminate knowledge to the data management community through the four founding organizations listed above> Recognize outstanding commitment of community members with Country CDO Ambassador awards Show less

recommendations: Yong Hao Phoy “During my time as Regional Head of Commercial for C2B and B2C businesses at Carsome, I worked closely with Piyush Palkar. His expertise in analytics, AI/ML-driven innovations, and leadership as Chief Data Officer played a key role in driving important initiatives for the company. We worked together to establish a uniform pricing strategy, including the Buyer Calculator for purchase and an Automated Retail Pricing Strategy, ensuring consistency and scalability for both C2B and B2C businesses. Piyush also led the design and implementation of an automated data monitoring process, which improved efficiency and provided valuable insights for decision-making. Working with Piyush was a great experience, and I truly value his expertise, leadership, and teamwork.”

Priyanka Harlalka “Piyush was a wonderful manager to work with, and has great expertise in leadership, mentoring, motivation. He was very supportive and always encouraged to learn new tools and technology. He's very much a hands-on manager and always had a clear understanding of business requirements. Even in tight deadlines and in a situation of crisis, he was always there guiding us, and not losing his cool. Very focused, dedicated and always carried a positive attitude towards work and his subordinates. Keep up the good work! Hope to work together in the future.”

volunteer_experience.info: The Global CDO Ambassador Program provides a partnership between the CDO Ambassador, MIT CDOIQ Symposium, International Society of Chief Data Officers, Institute for Chief Data Officers, and CDO Magazine. https://cdoiq.mit.edu/https://iscdo.org/https://www.cdomagazine.tech/The vision of the program is to create and grow a global CDO community of data champions with the following primary objectives:> Empower Global CDO Ambassadors to build, champion, and… Show more The Global CDO Ambassador Program provides a partnership between the CDO Ambassador, MIT CDOIQ Symposium, International Society of Chief Data Officers, Institute for Chief Data Officers, and CDO Magazine. https://cdoiq.mit.edu/https://iscdo.org/https://www.cdomagazine.tech/The vision of the program is to create and grow a global CDO community of data champions with the following primary objectives:> Empower Global CDO Ambassadors to build, champion, and deliver data value to their constituents> Exchange ideas, success stories, and lessons learned> Develop and authentic, informal, and informative community of CDOs, by CDOs, and for CDOs> Serve as a platform for CDOs to elevate the value of data assets for their organizations > Disseminate knowledge to the data management community through the four founding organizations listed above> Recognize outstanding commitment of community members with Country CDO Ambassador awards Show less

detailed_profile.about: Qualified Chartered Accountant with over 20 years of experience in Finance & Accounts, Working Capital Management, Internal Audit & Control and Statutory Compliance. Proven ability to improve operations, impact business growth and maximize profits through achievements in finance management, cost reductions, internal control & productivity improvements. Excels in the maintenance & finalization of accounts, periodic cash flow management and reconciliations and profitability monitoring of internal financial controls. Deft in developing & maintaining MIS reports and preparing monthly financial statement. Understanding in formulating budgets and implementing systems / procedures. Expertise in formulating & preparing scope of audit, audit plans, audit programme and audit reports with recommendation & suggestion for improvement in internal control system. Ascertain needs and goals, streamline operations and envision new concepts.

recommendations: Yong Hao Phoy “During my time as Regional Head of Commercial for C2B and B2C businesses at Carsome, I worked closely with Piyush Palkar. His expertise in analytics, AI/ML-driven innovations, and leadership as Chief Data Officer played a key role in driving important initiatives for the company. We worked together to establish a uniform pricing strategy, including the Buyer Calculator for purchase and an Automated Retail Pricing Strategy, ensuring consistency and scalability for both C2B and B2C businesses. Piyush also led the design and implementation of an automated data monitoring process, which improved efficiency and provided valuable insights for decision-making. Working with Piyush was a great experience, and I truly value his expertise, leadership, and teamwork.”

Priyanka Harlalka “Piyush was a wonderful manager to work with, and has great expertise in leadership, mentoring, motivation. He was very supportive and always encouraged to learn new tools and technology. He's very much a hands-on manager and always had a clear understanding of business requirements. Even in tight deadlines and in a situation of crisis, he was always there guiding us, and not losing his cool. Very focused, dedicated and always carried a positive attitude towards work and his subordinates. Keep up the good work! Hope to work together in the future.”

detailed_profile.name: Kshitij Chandra Prasad
detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

detailed_profile.name: Kshitij Chandra Prasad
detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

recommendations: Yong Hao Phoy “During my time as Regional Head of Commercial for C2B and B2C businesses at Carsome, I worked closely with Piyush Palkar. His expertise in analytics, AI/ML-driven innovations, and leadership as Chief Data Officer played a key role in driving important initiatives for the company. We worked together to establish a uniform pricing strategy, including the Buyer Calculator for purchase and an Automated Retail Pricing Strategy, ensuring consistency and scalability for both C2B and B2C businesses. Piyush also led the design and implementation of an automated data monitoring process, which improved efficiency and provided valuable insights for decision-making. Working with Piyush was a great experience, and I truly value his expertise, leadership, and teamwork.”

Priyanka Harlalka “Piyush was a wonderful manager to work with, and has great expertise in leadership, mentoring, motivation. He was very supportive and always encouraged to learn new tools and technology. He's very much a hands-on manager and always had a clear understanding of business requirements. Even in tight deadlines and in a situation of crisis, he was always there guiding us, and not losing his cool. Very focused, dedicated and always carried a positive attitude towards work and his subordinates. Keep up the good work! Hope to work together in the future.”

detailed_profile.about: Qualified Chartered Accountant with over 20 years of experience in Finance & Accounts, Working Capital Management, Internal Audit & Control and Statutory Compliance. Proven ability to improve operations, impact business growth and maximize profits through achievements in finance management, cost reductions, internal control & productivity improvements. Excels in the maintenance & finalization of accounts, periodic cash flow management and reconciliations and profitability monitoring of internal financial controls. Deft in developing & maintaining MIS reports and preparing monthly financial statement. Understanding in formulating budgets and implementing systems / procedures. Expertise in formulating & preparing scope of audit, audit plans, audit programme and audit reports with recommendation & suggestion for improvement in internal control system. Ascertain needs and goals, streamline operations and envision new concepts.

experience.description: Key Result Areas:	Managed finalization of annual financial statements of the entity and its group companies	Led quarterly internal audit and ensuring the compliances to report to Audit Committee	Ensured adherence to compliances related to Reserve Bank of India (RBI), Direct Tax and Indirect Taxes	Generated MIS & annual operating plan	Created management accounts to report monthly revenue & profitability of the organization 	Performed comparison of actual performance with annual operating plan and reporting to management and investors	Contributed in formulating strategic business relationships, corporate restructuring, risk assessment and control 	Driven debt raising through term loans from public & private sector bank, non-banking financial institutions, securitization and non-convertible debenture issue	Leading the taxation matter with respect to assessments and appeals	Timely filing of Withholding & Service Tax Returns and other statutory dues to governmentHighlights: 	Spearheaded the project of centralization of accounts within one month	Pioneered the merger of wholly owned subsidiary company with parent company
experience.description_html:
Key Result Areas:
 Managed finalization of annual financial statements of the entity and its group companies
 Led quarterly internal audit and ensuring the compliances to report to Audit Committee
 Ensured adherence to compliances related to Reserve Bank of India (RBI), Direct Tax and Indirect Taxes
 Generated MIS & annual operating plan
 Created management accounts to report monthly revenue & profitability of the organization
 Performed comparison of actual performance with annual operating plan and reporting to management and investors
 Contributed in formulating strategic business relationships, corporate restructuring, risk assessment and control
 Driven debt raising through term loans from public & private sector bank, non-banking financial institutions, securitization and non-convertible debenture issue
 Leading the taxation matter with respect to assessments and appeals
 Timely filing of Withholding & Service Tax Returns and other statutory dues to government

Highlights:
 Spearheaded the project of centralization of accounts within one month
 Pioneered the merger of wholly owned subsidiary company with parent company

experience.description_html:
Key Result Areas:
At Dilta Services Pvt. Ltd.
 Contributed as a member of the team looking after the merger of overseas entities with Indian Entities and doing necessary filings with Registrar of Companies (ROC) and Reserve Bank of India (RBI)
 Evaluated performance of the Wealth Manager and monitored the investment strategies
 Managed the taxation matter with respect to assessments
 Assisting in ROC related matters like form / return filings, preparing minutes and keeping statutory registers

At NeoGrowth Credit Pvt. Ltd. ( a registered non-banking finance company)
 Ensured adherence to compliances related to Reserve Bank of India (RBI), Companies Act, Direct Tax and Indirect Taxes
 Led appraisal of loan proposals and evaluated the loan eligibility & risk for conducting personal interview of applicant and supervised residence & office verification
 Created MIS & budgets for management reporting and coordinating with borrowers for collection on timely basis
 Prepared management accounts to report monthly revenue & profitability of the organization
 Authorization of all the disbursements and payments to vendors
 Driven banking activities pertaining to debt raising and short term overdraft

recommendations: Yong Hao Phoy “During my time as Regional Head of Commercial for C2B and B2C businesses at Carsome, I worked closely with Piyush Palkar. His expertise in analytics, AI/ML-driven innovations, and leadership as Chief Data Officer played a key role in driving important initiatives for the company. We worked together to establish a uniform pricing strategy, including the Buyer Calculator for purchase and an Automated Retail Pricing Strategy, ensuring consistency and scalability for both C2B and B2C businesses. Piyush also led the design and implementation of an automated data monitoring process, which improved efficiency and provided valuable insights for decision-making. Working with Piyush was a great experience, and I truly value his expertise, leadership, and teamwork.”

Priyanka Harlalka “Piyush was a wonderful manager to work with, and has great expertise in leadership, mentoring, motivation. He was very supportive and always encouraged to learn new tools and technology. He's very much a hands-on manager and always had a clear understanding of business requirements. Even in tight deadlines and in a situation of crisis, he was always there guiding us, and not losing his cool. Very focused, dedicated and always carried a positive attitude towards work and his subordinates. Keep up the good work! Hope to work together in the future.”

matched.match_rationale: Riitta Grönroos holds a senior development role and has experience in development management, which aligns with Haripada Roy's focus on talent and leadership development.

detailed_profile.name: Riitta Grönroos
detailed_profile.position: Senior Development Manager at Telia Finland / Business Marketing Communication
detailed_profile.about: I have gained wide experience in strategic and operative marketing planning and implementation in B2B sector through various positions that I have held. My experience and skills covers for example tactical focused marketing activities and company value creation though company brand and company image building activities. My working experience and achievements coverns traditional marketing media mix; events, campaigns, DM, PR and advertising are familiar as well new digital channels like social media, web and mobile marketing. I have good knowledge of in telecom and IT business sector (product, customers, competition and marketing) as I have always worked in close collaboration with sales. One of the important areas that I have been working over the past years has been creation of customer messages especially in new business areas and opportunities (e.g. ASP market) including how to develop marketing communication strategy to that will maximize the market breakthrough via the choice of message and media mix. I enjoy working with multiple external stakeholders such as associations, partner entities, advertising agencies and distribution partners and channels in variety of marketing activities as new collaboration models and interaction with different kinds of people, challenges, out-of-box thinking and conceptual service design motivates me the most. I am at my best in inventing and creating new market opportunities and market leadership position for my employer in the challenging environment, as I am ambitious and highly committed to achieving efficient results. One of the important areas I work for is an effectiveness of marketing investments and how to develop and measure it.

current_company.name: Telia Finland
current_company.title: Senior Development Manager at Telia Finland / Business Marketing Communication

experience.title: Development Manager, B2B Market planning
experience.description: I worked as a team leader in B2B marketing planning team. My main responsibility area consisted of yearly marketing message planning by creating, planning and implementing marketing themes with customer insight team, sales, business units and other internal resource groups and external stakeholders. Theme planning was based on the New Spirit of Finland, Understanding the new economic growth – messaging that supports TeliaSonera leadership positions and strengthens growth in TeliaSonera field of operations. Also two books that relate to the marketing theme have been published in connection with this activity “Understanding Neogrowth” and “Anatomia of Neogrowth”. I was also responsible for the development, use and guidance of customer message content and tools in collaboration with personnel that interface with customers. The goals and targets for the marketing activities were set prior execution of marketing activities and all the activities were monitored and measured in order to develop the activities further.

positions.subtitle: TeliaSonera
positions.description: I was responsible for developing and creating strategic customer messages and appropriate actions based on customer insights with marketing group. Customer messages were made in order to match target audience needs and offering that enabled growth for TeliaSonera in Finland. In addition my job consisted of internal communication of our customer message and creation and development of practical sales tools based on our customer message. The job required cooperation with marketing team, sales, customer service, business units and advertising agencies. One of the most important achievements that we made was publishing “Understanding Neogrowth” – book 2010 that was widely recognized by stakeholders.

experience.title: Country Marketing Manager
experience.description: I worked as a country marketing manager in a global IT company at Sonera Juxto Finland Oy. The company stood out in the ASP sector with its expertise in the management of mobile communications, information security and services. The co-operation included international co-ordination within Sonera Juxto Ltd group (Finland, Sweden, Germany). I was responsible for strategic and operational marketing communications team, consisting of seven people in Finland. Sonera Juxto was a top-of-mind ASP services provider, receiving 29% of spontaneous first mentions, while the corresponding figure for other companies in ranking positions was only 6%. Overall awareness was 51% in companies employing more than 100 people, but it was notable that overall awareness in the core target group, namely companies employing more than 500 people, was 68%.

publications.description: "Osataanko yrityksessäsi hyödyntää teknologian kehitystä tuottavuuden ja työn mielekkyyden parantamiseksi? Saatteko valjastettua teknologiaa luonnonvarojen säästämiseksi? Teknologia tarjoaa meille uudenlaisen mahdollisuuden nähdä ongelmat haasteena, luoda jotain uutta ja parempaa."Työskentelin toimittajana kirjassa ja vastasin useista asiantuntijahaastatteluista sekä tekstin editoimisesta yhdessä muun tiimin kanssa.---As co-writer of the book, I wrote several interviews and took part in editing the final version of the book.

detailed_profile.position: MarTech Associate | Financial Accounting | NUS MiM'22
detailed_profile.about: With a Master's degree in Management from NUS Business School and a Bachelor's degree in Accounting and Finance, I have a strong academic background in both business and finance domains. I have also acquired multiple certifications in Microsoft Excel and Fundamentals of Digital Marketing, demonstrating my continuous learning and skill development. As a Marketing Analyst and Reporting Intern at GLG, I applied my analytical and marketing skills to conduct research, generate reports and provide insights on various topics and industries. Previously, as a project director at NUS Indian Cultural Society and a team leader at AIESEC in Chennai, I led and coordinated a team of volunteers to organize and execute cultural programs and activities, enhancing my leadership, teamwork and event management skills. I am passionate about learning new things and adapting to changing environments. I believe that the willingness and ability to learn is a crucial skill in today's dynamic world. I am eager to work in the field of digital marketing, finance, accounting, or management, where I can leverage my analytical, creative, and problem-solving abilities to deliver value and results as well as provide my knowledge and interests to contribute to the success of the organization and the society. Please feel free to reach out to me at sandhyahsv@gmail.com.

matched.match_rationale: Sandhya Somu has experience in team leadership and coordination, which aligns with Deepankar Sadhukhan's skills in teamwork and communication.

detailed_profile.name: Sandhya Somu
detailed_profile.city: Quatre Bornes, Plaines Wilhems District, Mauritius
detailed_profile.position: MarTech Associate | Financial Accounting | NUS MiM'22
detailed_profile.about: With a Master's degree in Management from NUS Business School and a Bachelor's degree in Accounting and Finance, I have a strong academic background in both business and finance domains. I have also acquired multiple certifications in Microsoft Excel and Fundamentals of Digital Marketing, demonstrating my continuous learning and skill development. As a Marketing Analyst and Reporting Intern at GLG, I applied my analytical and marketing skills to conduct research, generate reports and provide insights on various topics and industries. Previously, as a project director at NUS Indian Cultural Society and a team leader at AIESEC in Chennai, I led and coordinated a team of volunteers to organize and execute cultural programs and activities, enhancing my leadership, teamwork and event management skills. I am passionate about learning new things and adapting to changing environments. I believe that the willingness and ability to learn is a crucial skill in today's dynamic world. I am eager to work in the field of digital marketing, finance, accounting, or management, where I can leverage my analytical, creative, and problem-solving abilities to deliver value and results as well as provide my knowledge and interests to contribute to the success of the organization and the society. Please feel free to reach out to me at sandhyahsv@gmail.com.

experience.title: Marketing Analyst and Reporting Intern
experience.description: Worked together with APAC Marketing Campaign Manager and her team on tracking and measuring the campaign metric, reporting the campaign numbers, creating email campaigns.• Developed a monthly PowerPoint Dashboard for India, China, Japan, SEA (Greater China, North and South Asia Region) to track 7 monthly digest, Corp Webcast and Ad hoc Campaign Reporting which help understand product performance.• Created YoY, YTD and region-wise comparison for specific Surveys and Campaigns• Tracked Website UTM for all the monthly digest• Engaged Salesforce lead reports to aid sales department in easier identification of potential client touchpoints
experience.description_html:
Worked together with APAC Marketing Campaign Manager and her team on tracking and measuring the campaign metric, reporting the campaign numbers, creating email campaigns.
• Developed a monthly PowerPoint Dashboard for India, China, Japan, SEA (Greater China, North and South Asia Region) to track 7 monthly digest, Corp Webcast and Ad hoc Campaign Reporting which help understand product performance.
• Created YoY, YTD and region-wise comparison for specific Surveys and Campaigns
• Tracked Website UTM for all the monthly digest
• Engaged Salesforce lead reports to aid sales department in easier identification of potential client touchpoints

experience.title: Marketing Intern
experience.description: Worked together with Trade Marketing Manager (APAC) on marketing activities such as market segmentation, product market share analysis, conduct customer survey insight.• Developed a quarterly PowerPoint dashboard for Japan, China, Korea, Vietnam & Malaysia to track sales of over 30 SKUs with actual sales and forecasted sales performance ratios.• Created customer survey with a google form & distributed to all customers within the 5 markets through Mailchimp along with the monthly newsletter to better understand how covid-19 has affected/changed customer purchasing patterns.
experience.description_html:
Worked together with Trade Marketing Manager (APAC) on marketing activities such as market segmentation, product market share analysis, conduct customer survey insight.
• Developed a quarterly PowerPoint dashboard for Japan, China, Korea, Vietnam & Malaysia to track sales of over 30 SKUs with actual sales and forecasted sales performance ratios.
• Created customer survey with a google form & distributed to all customers within the 5 markets through Mailchimp along with the monthly newsletter to better understand how covid-19 has affected/changed customer purchasing patterns.

detailed_profile.about: Qualified Chartered Accountant with over 20 years of experience in Finance & Accounts, Working Capital Management, Internal Audit & Control and Statutory Compliance. Proven ability to improve operations, impact business growth and maximize profits through achievements in finance management, cost reductions, internal control & productivity improvements. Excels in the maintenance & finalization of accounts, periodic cash flow management and reconciliations and profitability monitoring of internal financial controls. Deft in developing & maintaining MIS reports and preparing monthly financial statement. Understanding in formulating budgets and implementing systems / procedures. Expertise in formulating & preparing scope of audit, audit plans, audit programme and audit reports with recommendation & suggestion for improvement in internal control system. Ascertain needs and goals, streamline operations and envision new concepts.

experience.description: Key Result Areas:	Managed finalization of annual financial statements of the entity and its group companies	Led quarterly internal audit and ensuring the compliances to report to Audit Committee	Ensured adherence to compliances related to Reserve Bank of India (RBI), Direct Tax and Indirect Taxes	Generated MIS & annual operating plan	Created management accounts to report monthly revenue & profitability of the organization 	Performed comparison of actual performance with annual operating plan and reporting to management and investors	Contributed in formulating strategic business relationships, corporate restructuring, risk assessment and control 	Driven debt raising through term loans from public & private sector bank, non-banking financial institutions, securitization and non-convertible debenture issue	Leading the taxation matter with respect to assessments and appeals	Timely filing of Withholding & Service Tax Returns and other statutory dues to governmentHighlights: 	Spearheaded the project of centralization of accounts within one month	Pioneered the merger of wholly owned subsidiary company with parent company

Key Result Areas:
 Managed finalization of annual financial statements of the entity and its group companies
 Led quarterly internal audit and ensuring the compliances to report to Audit Committee
 Ensured adherence to compliances related to Reserve Bank of India (RBI), Direct Tax and Indirect Taxes
 Generated MIS & annual operating plan
 Created management accounts to report monthly revenue & profitability of the organization
 Performed comparison of actual performance with annual operating plan and reporting to management and investors
 Contributed in formulating strategic business relationships, corporate restructuring, risk assessment and control
 Driven debt raising through term loans from public & private sector bank, non-banking financial institutions, securitization and non-convertible debenture issue
 Leading the taxation matter with respect to assessments and appeals
 Timely filing of Withholding & Service Tax Returns and other statutory dues to government

Highlights:
 Spearheaded the project of centralization of accounts within one month
 Pioneered the merger of wholly owned subsidiary company with parent company

At Dilta Services Pvt. Ltd.

detailed_profile.position: Ops & Strategy Leader | Scaled Gojek Ads 40× | Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps | Start-up & Scale-up Growth
detailed_profile.about: Operator & strategist with extensive experience in scaling revenue, streamlining operations, and fixing complex GTM problems for startups and scale-ups. At Gojek (GoTo Group), I joined the Ads monetization team when it was a start-up within a unicorn and helped scale it 40× to $XM+/month by leading product ops, sales ops, and cross-functional GTM strategy across sales, product, and marketing. 🚀 Key wins: • Launched 5+ ad products generating $XM+/month in new revenue • Built and led ops teams from 0 to 20+, covering campaign ops, strategy, and design • Implemented automation & reporting systems that cut turnaround times and improved revenue realization Specialties: Product Ops • Sales Ops • RevOps • GTM Planning & Execution • Process Design & Automation • Start-up & Scale-up Growth After relocating to the Netherlands, I took a structured break to expand my network, explore European markets, and complete a Culinary Arts program (personal passion project). I also stayed engaged with start-up/scale-up ecosystems and upskilled in RevOps and GTM practices. I’m now ready to bring my scale-up operations and revenue growth expertise to a high-growth team.

publications.title: Indian Aviation Sector: The Parallel Rise & Fall
publications.subtitle: IJSER
publications.description: This paper explores profuse reports, statistics, and published papers concerned with the Indian aviation sector from pre-1991 era to the current scenario. With a brief history on the pre-1991 operations in the sector and its players, a detailed outlook on the policy changes of 1991 along the lines of liberalization, open sky policy, green field airport, and FDI is provided. The paper’s cynosure lies on the growth of the aviation sector post-1991 and comparing it with the current failing state of the sector, which is paradoxical. The concurrent rise in demand and fall in supply of the aviation sector is attributed to high taxation on fuel, poor infrastructure, cut-throat competition, a 49% cap on FDI, political interference, incomplete disinvestment, and red tapism. These factors are scrutinized taking examples of Jet Airways, Air India, IndiGo and more, with an aim to provide the reader an insight on where the industry has gone wrong since the post-1991 phase.

detailed_profile.name: Sandhya Somu
detailed_profile.city: Quatre Bornes, Plaines Wilhems District, Mauritius
detailed_profile.position: MarTech Associate | Financial Accounting | NUS MiM'22
detailed_profile.about: With a Master's degree in Management from NUS Business School and a Bachelor's degree in Accounting and Finance, I have a strong academic background in both business and finance domains. I have also acquired multiple certifications in Microsoft Excel and Fundamentals of Digital Marketing, demonstrating my continuous learning and skill development. As a Marketing Analyst and Reporting Intern at GLG, I applied my analytical and marketing skills to conduct research, generate reports and provide insights on various topics and industries. Previously, as a project director at NUS Indian Cultural Society and a team leader at AIESEC in Chennai, I led and coordinated a team of volunteers to organize and execute cultural programs and activities, enhancing my leadership, teamwork and event management skills. I am passionate about learning new things and adapting to changing environments. I believe that the willingness and ability to learn is a crucial skill in today's dynamic world. I am eager to work in the field of digital marketing, finance, accounting, or management, where I can leverage my analytical, creative, and problem-solving abilities to deliver value and results as well as provide my knowledge and interests to contribute to the success of the organization and the society. Please feel free to reach out to me at sandhyahsv@gmail.com.
